sentences.en: I kept kicking and shaking my arms shuck my head.
sentences.cn: 我不断地蹬踢,挥舞双臂,晃动头脑.

sentences.en: On a good day, each employee will shuck 3,500 oysters.

sentences.en: Shuck wicker skin, connect body to show white, call white wicker.

sentences.en: The case - making and book block the process, called on case - making, also known as Shuck.

sentences.en: We are capable of opening mold for LCD TV and LCD monitor and producing plastic shuck.

words.tran_cn: 壳；外皮；荚；毫无价值的东西

trans.tran_cn: 壳，外皮，荚，毫无价值的东西
trans.tran_en: The shuck of something is its outer covering, for example, the leaves around an ear of corn, or the shell of a shellfish
